  • Constructor Details

    • ResearchAPI

      public ResearchAPI(String logType, String logLevel)
      Constructor for creating a ResearchAPI instance.
      Parameters:
      logType - The type of logging output (file or console)
      logLevel - The level of logging (ex. FINE, INFO, WARNING).
      Logs will be generated for levels following the one inputed.
      For example, if logLevel is set to INFO, logs will be generated for INFO and WARNING.

  • Method Details

    • addWantFormats

      public void addWantFormats(String... wantFormats)
      Add the formats wanted.
      Parameters:
      wantFormats - Formats wanted.

    • addFile

      public void addFile(String filepath)
      Add the file path of data to share and make an announcement.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The full file path of the data.

    • addConvertFormat

      public void addConvertFormat(String originalFormat, String destinationFormat)
      Add the formats that can be translated.
      Parameters:
      originalFormat - The original data format.
      destinationFormat - The translated data format.

    • connect

      public void connect()
      Connect to the RabbitMQ server.

    • startListening

      public void startListening()
      Start listening for messages.

    • getReceivedFile

      public String[] getReceivedFile()
      Get the received file path and format. Place method call in a while true loop to continuously check if file has been received. 
       
 ResearchAPI example = new ResearchAPI();
 
 while (true) {
        String[] fileInfo = example.getReceivedFile();
        String receivedFilePath = fileInfo[0];
        String receivedFileFormat = fileInfo[1];
 }
      Returns:
      An array: [filePath, fileFormat] or [null, null].
